## Biography

::: {.text-start}
I am a *research fellow* at the Centre for Vision, Speech and Signal Processing, University of Surrey.

Before that, I was a *research associate* at the School of Computer Science, The University of Adelaide from April 2022 to January 2024. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from The University of Adelaide in March 2022, an M.Phil. in Electronic Engineering also from The University of Adelaide in January 2018, and a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering from Portland State University in June 2012.
:::
